text: James Cuthbertson Calderwood (19 December 1898 – June 1968) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a full-back. ==References== Category:1898 births Category:1968 deaths Category:People from Busby Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Manchester Calico Printers F.C. players Category:Manchester City F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Sportspeople from East Renfrewshire
title: James Calderwood
